General.Name: Orzeł Biały SA
General.Description: Orzel Bialy S.A. produces and sells refined lead and related alloys through the recycling of waste batteries and other lead-bearing waste in Poland. It also provides polypropylene and regranulated polypropylene from the waste batteries recycling process. The company offers its products to battery making companies, primarily in the automotive industry. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1858 and is headquartered in Piekary Slaskie, Poland. Orzel Bialy S.A. is a subsidiary of ZAP Sznajder Batterien S.A.
